string.name: guide_page_1_title
string.value: CoolMall - HarmonyOS NEXT E-Commerce Learning Project

string.name: guide_page_1_desc
string.value:
Built with HarmonyOS NEXT and ArkTS
Open source and free to help developers grow fast
Provides complete HarmonyOS references and learning resources

string.name: guide_page_2_desc
string.value:
Build smooth UIs with ArkUI
MVVM architecture, View focuses on rendering
ViewModel handles business logic and state

string.name: guide_page_3_desc
string.value:
Auth, product display, search & categories
Cart management, full order & payment flow
Learning cases close to real business scenarios

string.name: guide_page_4_desc
string.value:
Multi-module design with clear responsibilities
Shared models and components are consolidated
Great for learning and secondary development
